Articles.Content:
So after seeing the recent KSP TV stream and the really cool train that was featured, I decided to try and build my own. It originally was a regular train (it even once had ISRU capability), but then my mind thought of a really crazy idea. This is the result.![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

[http://imgur.com/a/CwkBG](http://imgur.com/a/CwkBG)

It has a hyper-funnel, nice orange looking lights to simulate a firebox, capacity for 16 kerbals and 2 seats up front to drive from (with a probe core in case you don't want to walk 2 kerbals over there). And of course, it flies, relatively well for what is basically a train with wings, control surfaces and engines bolted on.

(PS I put the images in a link because I don't know how to embed images properly in a post)

You can embed the album with [imgur ] [/imgur ] tags (remove the space before the brackets). Put the "CwkBG" code in between the tags. Like this:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/CwkBG)
